symptomAnalyzerDescription: Describe your symptoms, and our AI will suggest potential over-the-counter medicines and relevant information. This is not medical advice.
symptomsPlaceholder: e.g., headache, mild fever, sore throat for 2 days...
suggestedMedicinesInfo: Based on your symptoms, here are some AI-generated informational suggestions. Always consult a healthcare professional before taking any medication.
suggestedMedicalSpecialtyInfo: For symptoms like these, you might consider consulting a {specialty}.
suggestedMedicalSpecialtyDisclaimer: This is an AI-generated suggestion and not a formal referral.
noMedicineSuggestionsInfo: The AI could not provide specific medicine suggestions based on the input. Please ensure your symptoms are described clearly or consult a healthcare professional for advice.
analysisResultsDescription: Below are AI-generated suggestions based on your symptoms.
noDataGenerated: AI could not generate {entity} examples for {location}{specialtyString}. Please try a different location or broaden your search.
validationMaxChars: Please enter no more than {count} characters.
validationLocationMinChars: Location must be at least {count} characters.
validationFailedMessage: Validation failed. Please check the fields below.
footerDisclaimer: Information provided by this tool is for informational purposes only and does not constitute medical advice. Always consult with a qualified healthcare professional for any health concerns or before making any decisions related to your health or treatment.
adminLoginFailed: Login failed. Please check your credentials.
createPostDescription: Fill in the details below to publish a new article to the MediSeek blog.
postTitlePlaceholder: Enter the title of your blog post
postContentPlaceholder: Write the full content of your blog post here...
postExcerptPlaceholder: Write a short summary or teaser for the post...
welcomeAdminDescription: This is your MediSeek administration dashboard.
dashboardOverviewContent: From here, you can manage blog posts, view site statistics (coming soon), and configure application settings (coming soon). Use the sidebar to navigate through the admin sections.
totalPostsDescription: Current number of published blog articles.
